description.value:
Designed to be used by an operator, or placed covertly to record a particular area. Requires a -10 Tech-Use Test (or harder depending on cirucmstances) to listen in or record Vox transmissions. If they are encrypted further analysis may be required. Short Range Versions are the size of a Data-Slate and have a range of 2-3km.

Effect: Rare
